import React from 'react' const LoginAdmin = () => { return (

Login Admin

setUsername(e.target.value)} className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded" placeholder="Masukkan username" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded" placeholder="Masukkan password" />
) } export default LoginAdmin
